"I Will Survive" by Gloria Gaynor: This classic anthem is a powerful reminder that no matter what challenges life throws your way, you can overcome them and come out stronger on the other side.
"Don't Worry Be Happy" by Bobby McFerrin: This lighthearted and carefree song is a great reminder to let go of your worries and focus on the things that truly matter in life.
"Can't Stop" by Red Hot Chili Peppers: This energetic and upbeat song is a great way to get pumped up and motivated to take on whatever challenges come your way.
"I Gotta Feeling" by Black Eyed Peas: This high-energy song is a great way to boost your confidence and feel empowered to take on anything that comes your way.
"Walking on Sunshine" by Katrina and the Waves: This feel-good song is a great way to brighten up your day and put a smile on your face.
